content: crochet your own adorable ox with floppy hair sweet little horns ears hooves and a bell this amigurumi ox is fun to work up with a unique construction method and is the perfect gift for your loved ones born in the year of the ox note that the **free crochet pattern** can be found ** here 1 ** and there are **two step-by-step tutorials** that contain detailed pictures * **part 1** covers how to crochet the body dividing into four leg chains and crocheting each leg and can be found *** here 2 *** * **part 2** covers how to crochet the snout hair hooves belly horns ears and tail and can be found *** here 3 *** i used approximately 45 g of tan coboo 5 g of white coboo and 3 g of taupe coboo the hair was crocheted using 3 g of moco cafe soft & fluffy knitting yarn in mocha latte from daiso we started a fun tradition of designing the zodiac amigurumi of that year since january 2011 so far we have lamb dragon rooster monkey pony snake rat dog chinese new year doll pig and now ox we have two left to go tiger & rabbit they are all available as free patterns on my blog or as pdf s here on ravelry condensed documents that contain all the step-by-step pictures enjoy these zodiac amigurumi designs 1 https //www allaboutami com/pattern-chinese-new-year-ox/ 2 https //www allaboutami com/chinese-new-year-ox-part-1/ 3 https //www allaboutami com/chinese-new-year-ox-part-2/
